name: Drums pro HD
description:
Our Real drum kit simulator offers you unique music experience like never before.
Play, listen or learn drums like professional.

You can play Drums pro percussion for fun, school or band practice it's your choice.

Percussion in drum kit: Snare drum, 2 x Kick, Tom-tom, Floor, Hi-hat (open/close), Cowbell, cymbals (crash, splash, ride), snare rand sticks. In new updates there will be new percussions, wait for it!

Some features:
- Volume setup control for each percussion
- 12 lessons patterns to learn or listen
- 15 different drums and cymbals
- Drum kit stage creator with save/load configuration
- Multiple finger touch / tap
- Real drum sounds
- Low latency sounds
